process.question: How can AI improve the e-commerce shopping experience?
process.answer: An AI can offer a premium shopping experience by showing tailored product suggestions, fastening product search, drawing comparisons, solving queries 24/7, and performing other e-commerce-related tasks. This results in happier customers and potentially increased sales.

process.answer: Predictive analytics uses historical data to identify patterns, predict future trends, and optimize marketing tactics and sales operations. By understanding shifts in user behavior, market demand, and industry trends, businesses can make more informed decisions and allocate resources more effectively.

support.question: What are some benefits of AI in customer support?
support.answer: AI in customer support allows businesses to automate FAQ answering, solve common issues, raise tickets, and connect complex chats to live agents. This results in faster and more efficient customer service, freeing up human agents for more complex issues.
